title: St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador
summary: St. John's is the capital and largest city of the Canadian province, Newfoundland and Labrador, located on the eastern tip of the Avalon Peninsula on the island of Newfoundland. It is the oldest city in Canada.[6] The city spans 446.04 square kilometres (172.22 sq mi) and is the easternmost city in North America (excluding Greenland).[7][8][9][10]
